title: Fin Taylor • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #192
itunes:title: Fin Taylor • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #192
itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the ace comic FIN TAYLOR!
description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the ace comic FIN TAYLOR!


A great chat with Fin and Brett, as they chat all things film and life and death which incorporates a ton of what’s happening right here in the present. Thankfully the present has much to offer in this case, as Fin has a new standup special out (link below) as well as (possibly more importantly) a new child! We hear all about his new (quote) “wholesome and folksy” lifestyle, brushes with movies, big cinema dogs, revelations pertaining to Nick Cage and tin flutes, said comedy special and all sorts besides. Shamless! Enjoy!


FIN LINKS

ONLINE

TWITTER 

SO MY WIFE (special) 


BRETT GOLDSTEIN on TWITTER

BRETT GOLDSTEIN on INSTAGRAM

SOULMATES

SUPERBOB (Brett's 2015 feature film)

CORNERBOYS with BRETT & SCROOBIUS PIP


DISTRACTION PIECES NETWORK on FACEBOOK

DISTRACTION PIECES NETWORK on INSTAGRAM

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
